ehidi ohu kiya sitiye ithama keti kalayakin parlimenthuwe pihiti wipaksha nayaka karyalayen iwathwa aandu paksha karyala desata gaman karana bawayi.me athara nawa aandukrama wyawasthawak gena eemata athamun uthsaha kirima agramathya ranil wikramasinha ha em.ee.sumandiran athara athi giwisumak kriyathmaka kirimak bawa wipaksha nayaka mahinda rajapaksha prakasha kala.
